name: Alpha Tales
description: I would HIGHLY recommend playing through the whole game, as there is an awesome boss at the end, which took up a majority of time to code! Thank you! (Game is compatible with non-mouse computers now, at this link: https://alpha-falsehonesty.c9users.io/AlphaTalesv0.1.1/index.html , but only when it is running, message me and I will start it. Otherwise play it here: https://falsehonesty.itch.io/alpha-tales-updated ). Big thanks to Kevin MacLeod and Visager for the background sound!
